tool_description: Analyzes calendar data to identify free time slots common across participants, considering working hours and minimum meeting duration requirements.

busy_periods.description: Array of busy time periods from calendar data

working_hours_start.description: Start of working hours in HH:MM format

working_hours_end.description: End of working hours in HH:MM format

error_messages: Invalid busy periods format: Each busy period must be a properly formatted time range string.
Invalid working hours: working_hours_start must be before working_hours_end and both must be in HH:MM format.
Invalid minimum duration: minimum_duration_minutes must be between 15 and 480 minutes.
No availability found: No common free time slots exist for the given constraints.
usage: Provide busy_periods array from calendar retrieval. Optionally set working_hours_start, working_hours_end, minimum_duration_minutes, and exclude_weekends. Returns available time slots that work for all participants.

available_slots.description: Array of available time slots with start and end times

total_slots_found.description: Total number of available slots identified

longest_available_duration.description: Duration in minutes of the longest available slot
